text: The Kuyangshu Nordic Center and Biathlon Center will be located in Chongli District, Zhangjiakou city, Hebei Province. This venue will host the biathlon, Nordic skiing, ski jumping and Nordic combined events for the 2022 Winter Olympics. Category:Venues of the 2022 Winter Olympics Category:Proposed sports venues in China Category:Sports venues in China Category:Zhangjiakou
title: Kuyangshu Nordic Center and Biathlon Center
